metadata.description: Collection of productivity plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: credo
plugins.description: Opinionated workflow guides and best practices - the preacher's proven patterns for Claude Code projects.

plugins.name: dogma
plugins.description: Intelligent sync of Claude instructions with enforcement hooks for security and consistency.

plugins.name: signal
plugins.description: Desktop notifications showing what Claude Code is working on - stay informed even when the terminal is not in focus.

plugins.name: limit
plugins.description: Live API usage display in Claude Code statusline - colored progress bars, reset times, tokens, context, session metrics, Git info, highscore tracking, and more.

plugins.name: hydra
plugins.description: Git Worktree management for parallel agent execution - isolated working directories without Git conflicts.

plugins.name: import
plugins.description: Import external documentation locally - bypass AI-blocking sites via Playwright or copy local paths.

plugins.name: get-shit-done
plugins.description: Meta-prompting, context engineering and spec-driven development system for Claude Code

plugins.name: marketplace
plugins.description: Development tools for Claude Code plugins - local testing without pushing.
